 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַ֫חַת‎</span> **noun [feminine]** ==winnowing-shovel==, or the like (√ unknown; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוח‎</span> = ***ventilabrum***, compare [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xl (1886), 728</sup>; [[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]] in [[BDB#De|De]]<sup>Is</sup> (2), 709 from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רחה‎</span> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be soft, loose, friable***, etc., compare [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1, 177</sup>; Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is probably loan-word [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>l.c</sup>.); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבַמִּזְרֶה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֹרֶה בָר‎</span> [[Isa.30.24|Isa 30:24]].
